p.s: This class allows the rendering of 3 dimensional objects utilizing PHP.
p.d:
Image_3D is a highly object oriented PHP5 package that allows the creation of 3 dimensional images using PHP.
Image_3D currently supports: * Creation of 3D objects like cubes, spheres, maps, text, pie, torus, ... * Own object definitions possible * Own material definitions * Import of 3DSMax files * Unlimited number of light sources * Rendering output via GD, SVG or ASCII
